text: Ate muyinza mutya obutalya e byo e byogereddwako e rinnya lya Katonda nga mazima yabannyonnyola e byo bye yaziyiza ku mmwe, mpozzi e kyo kye muba mukoze olwo buwaze, naye ate mazima ddala abantu bangi babuza (abalala) nga bagoberera okwagala kwa bwe okutaliimu kwesigama ku kumanya, mazima bulijjo Mukama omulabiriziwo amanyi nnyo e bikwata ku basukka e nsaloze
